title: Hello, I'm your personal Pebee therapist.
subtitle: Get personalized exercise programs based on studies and your symptoms. Start your journey to better health today.
movementTitle: Moving towards a life without pain
features: Discover personalized exercise programs, track your progress, and take control of your pain management journey.

calendar.title: Track Your Progress
calendar.text: Monitor your daily exercise routine with our intuitive calendar. See your achievements and stay motivated on your path to recovery.

programs.title: Personalized Exercise Programs
programs.text: Receive customized exercise plans based on your specific pain assessment. Each program is tailored to your condition and adapted to your progress.

assessment.title: Scientific Pain Assessment
assessment.text: Complete our comprehensive questionnaire to get an accurate analysis of your condition and receive the most suitable treatment recommendations.
